Title: Digital Electronics
Body: Date: Wed, 20 Nov 1996 22:13:40 GMT Server: NCSA/1.4.2 Content-type: text/html Last-modified: Tue, 03 Sep 1996 13:09:00 GMT Content-length: 1169 Digital Electronics Digital Electronics (Computer Science 27) Identical to Engineering Sciences 27 Times: 97S, 97X, 98S: 9; Laboratory Instructors: Beckmann Dist: TAS This course teaches classical switching theory including Boolean algebra, logic minimization, algorithmic state machine abstractions, and synchronous system design.
